i know, Liono is moding me, too!......yet he doesn't get accused of moding
when i do.....well, it appears he's moding everyone.....to Liono if he reads
this, if your going to be leader you have to be more devoted.....Simply
That.......anyone like my angle with Suukie?........
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 29, 2000 4:53 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Notes:  I fired at RgDan with all three of my remaining Predacon
characters
> and he failed to comply, that is god moding and if he disagrees I'd be
more
> than happy to forward the e-mail, and also TMRattrap, a power supply off
of a
> Maximal (iris), around such a huge craft as the Ark, wouldn't last long,
> since Iris is able to still move and all, I'm taking it that she isn't
> putting all of her power into the Ark, so as an estimate, I'd have to say
> just a laser blast would bring the shields down, but that is an estimate,
> thanks to all who read this)
>
> Nemesis Enforcer/ Stinkbomb/ Ramhorn/ Injector/ Manterror/ Double Punch:
>
>
> ::Nemesis Enforcer transformed into his beast mode, hiding in the darkness
of
> a corner, camoflagued to the naked optic sensor, guarding the CR chamber
> Wolfgang was currently in::
>
> ========================================================
>
> ::Stinkbomb and Ramhorn charged into the room, looking to see Hell Beast
and
> some of his minions (among them is Double Punch, who is actually in his
> stealth mode)::
> "Slag!"
> ::Both Maximals opened fire at Hell Beast, Ramhorn with his sub-machine
gun,
> firing off a few dozen sonic shells::
> "Die!" Stinkbomb yelled ::raising his tail rifle, he fired off a long
green
> spray of a paralyzing chemical at Hell Beast, soon giving everything it
came
> in contact with a nasty odor that could only be rid of by bathing in a
> certain 'plant':: (Not to post damage, but no real other way to say it)
> ::Both Maximals dodged for cover, landing behind a rather large metal
crate::
>
> ::Double Punch coughed and sputtered, the spray not hitting him, but
really
> close::
> "Ugh, ufgh!" (he choked, raising a pincher and firing off a missile at
where
> he had seen the two Maximals go for cover at::
>
> ===========================================================
>
> ::Injector and Manterror stood fifteen feet from the makeshift shield::
>
> "My scans say it is low on energy." Manterror said
>
> "As do mine.  Dispose of it!"
> ::Injector fired off three stinger missiles, Manterror firing four ion
discs::
> ::Both charged into the Ark, each looking at destroyed auto-guns in the
> cieling::
> (Not to post damage, but they went in a few seconds after Hell Beast
killed
> the weak shield)
>
